text: you are at a train station platform where you are waiting

for your train there's a small pamphlet
sitting on the display case about a new

train that will be introduced next year
you decide to pick up and read the

pamphlet what is the main feature and
the biggest advantage of the new Train

what is the main feature and the biggest
advantage of the new Train

the main feature of the Train is that it
is propelled by magnetism the biggest

advantage is and it can reach twice the
speed of any train that runs on tracks
